availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel P. Alexander (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Tomzen Shepherd Alexander in Franklin County, Kentucky, on January 13, 1846. Father of Louisa B. Alexander and James W. Alexander. Married to Mary McDonald Alexander in Franklin County, Kentucky, on March 8, 1860. Father of John S. Alexander and Ann M. Alexander. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 25A-B.
